webPage.name: ATS Recruiting Software & Smart Hiring Tool | Flowxtra
webPage.description: Flowxtra delivers an AI-powered applicant tracking system with kanban pipelines, automation, collaborative scorecards, and white-label career pages. Designed for startups, SMBs, and enterprise hiring teams.

mainEntity.name: What makes Flowxtra different from other ATS tools?

acceptedAnswer.text: Flowxtra combines unlimited job posting, kanban hiring pipelines, automated workflows, custom scorecards, and social media recruitment inside one ATS.

mainEntity.name: Does Flowxtra support collaboration and approvals?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Hiring teams can comment on candidates, assign tasks, share scorecards, and trigger automated approvals so everyone stays aligned.
